medium: porcelain; w/scalloped rim, vertical handle,fluted body; ovglaze dec: red/gold dart band, blue/gold star band; Boudinot coat/arms
dimensions: ht. w/handle, 6.8 cm.; w/out handle, 5.1; length, 19.3 cm.
creditline: Gift of the Thorne Foundation for the Boudinot Collection
